title: US Federal Business Opportunity: Department of the Interior: 70--Encrypted Password Vault Software ¿ Dell TPAM
content:
Agency: Department of the Interior 
Office: National Park Service Location: NPS - All Offices 
Date you need to respond by: 8-September-2015 
Classification Code: 70 -- General purpose information technology equipment 
Solicitation Number: P15PS02803 Naics code: 511210  Software Publishers 


Description: 
Notice Type: Presolicitation. Set Aside: Total Small Business 

The DOI National Park Service (NPS) intends to issue a purchase order for the for Total Privileged Access Management (TPAM) software manufactured by Dell software.  This procurement is being issued as a limited source, brand name acquisition for the items specified. Dell TPAM has specifically been selected to meet network requirements requirements.  Award will be made to the lowest priced, technically acceptable quote. Alternate quotes will not be accepted. Award will be made on an all or none basis. This acquisition is set-aside for small business award only.

All responses must be received by the closing date of this publication in order to be considered by the Government.

No refurbished products/equipment will be considered. Vendors must be authorized Dell resellers. 

Additional Info can be found at: 
https://www.fbo.gov/spg/DOI/NPS/APC-IS/P15PS02803/listing.html Contact details for this United States Federal Business Opportunity: 
MAHLBURG, PAULA 
Contracting Office Address: 
NPS, WASO - WCP Contracting 
P.O.Box 25287 MS WCP 
Denver 
CO 
80225 
US
